title: NyeFe
author: NyeFe
content: I'm looking for a very outspoken community manager, who's able to constantly engage with community users, start and keep conversations. Create ideas, and make out discord community fun. We're looking for someone who can create community activities... and engage with other communities.DM me requests.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: By any chance have you seen [Overview] Bitcointalk Services from Bitcointalk Members, if not, you may directly contact them to reach out for the position that you need.Quote from: tranthidung on July 16, 2022, 10:47:31 AMTelegram / Discord Community Managers|Name|Rank|ANN|Contact|Notes||wwzsocki*|Legendary|Here|PM|||tranthidung*|Legendary|Here|PM|||Stedsm*|Legendary|Here|PM|||igehhh*|Legendary|Here|PM|||JanEmil*|Hero Member|Here|PM||

comments.author: Faisalul
comments.body: Quote from: NyeFe on July 29, 2022, 01:59:17 PMI'm looking for a very outspoken community manager, who's able to constantly engage with community users, start and keep conversations. Create ideas, and make out discord community fun. We're looking for someone who can create community activities... and engage with other communities.DM me requests.Hello Sir, Please Contact me on Telegram: https://t.me/MrWhiteDev

comments.author: allisonkeya
comments.created_time: August 07, 2022, 09:13:54 AMLast edit: August 07, 2022, 09:28:45 AM by allisonkeya
comments.body: Hello Greetings, are you still looking for a community manager? I am willing to apply, if not for CM, I can do for moderator. I have 2 years of experience as a community moderator for Telegram and Discord. I was also working on various projects before. I can also help you build a Filipino community in your project, translate every news and update, and keep the chat active and alive. I'm hoping for a response from you so we can discuss further information. Thank you! You can also contact me on Telegram - https://t.me/jeldznew

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: allisonkeya on August 07, 2022, 09:13:54 AMHello Greetings, are you still looking for a community manager? I am willing to apply, if not for CM, I can do for moderator. I have 2 years of experience as a community moderator for Telegram and Discord. I was also working on various projects before. I can also help you build a Filipino community in your project, translate every news and update, and keep the chat active and alive. I'm hoping for a response from you so we can discuss further information. Thank you! It's better if you are sending him a direct request about the job. it's clear if you shall PM him or he will not PM you for that. He's also inactive since a few days ago. Dropping him your application directly will become the best question if you wanna get direct answer. It's better doing that first rather than waiting him to send you a PM. good luck for that.
